Ogars - 2,000a (Age of Sigmar) [1,910pts]

        Selections: Cleaver

        Magic: Wizard, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Voracious Maw, Unit: Butcher, Unit Abilities: Bloodgruel, Weapon: Cleaver


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Wizard 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Voracious Maw
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Voracious Maw 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then, roll a dice. On a 1-3, the maw is satisfied and the sequence ends. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Keep rolling dice in this way until the maw is satisfied or the target unit is destroyed.

        Bloodgruel Roll a dice each time a this unit successfully casts or unbinds a spell, after the effects of the spell have been resolved. On a 2+, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this unit. However, on a 1, this unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Slaughtermaster [140pts]

        Selections: Blood Feast, Motley Assortment of Weapons, Stump Blades

        Magic: Wizard, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Blood Feast, Mystic Shield, Rockchomper, Unit: Slaughtermaster, Unit Abilities: Bloodgruel, Great Cauldron, Weapon: Motley Assortment of Weapons, Stump Blades


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Wizard 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Rockchomper
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Blood Feast 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly OGOR unit that is not a MONSTER and that is wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the start of your next hero phase. Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Rockchomper 518"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly OGOR GLUTTONS unit wholly u range and visible to the caster. Until the start of your next hero phase, rolls made for enemy units within 3" of that unit for the purposes of the Gulping Bite battle trait cause D6 mortal wounds on a 4+ instead of D3.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Slaughtermaster 6"785+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bloodgruel Roll a dice each time a this unit successfully casts or unbinds a spell, after the effects of the spell have been resolved. On a 2+, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this unit. However, on a 1, this unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Great Cauldron In your hero phase, you can say that this unit will reach into its cauldron and feast on the contents. If you do so, roll a dice and consult the table below.

        D6 Effect
        1 Bad Meat: This unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        2 Troggoth Guts: You can heal D3 wounds allocated to this unit. In addition, you can heal 1 wound allocated to each friendly OGOR unit wholly within 12" of this model.
        3-4 Spinemarrow: Pick a friendly OGOR unit wholly within 12" of this unit. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        5-6 Bonecrusher: Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 6" of this unit. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Tyrant [150pts]

        Selections: 1. Deathcheater, Beastskewer Glaive, General, Gruesome Trophy Rack, Killer Reputation, Ogor Pistols, Thundermace

        Categories: Leader, HERO, DESTRUCTION, OGOR, TYRANT, GUTBUSTERS, OGOR MAWTRIBES, 9 or less wounds Leader, Champion, GALLETIAN CHAMPION, General, GUTBUSTERS General, Artefact

        Artefact: Gruesome Trophy Rackr, Command Trait: Killer Reputation, Unit: Tyrant, Unit Abilities: Beastskewer Glaive, Big Name, Bully of the First Degree, Deathcheater, Thundermace, Weapon: Beastskewer Glaive, Ogor Pistols, Thundermace


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Gruesome Trophy Rackr Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly GUTBUSTERS units wholly within 12" of the bearer that target a MONSTER or HERO.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Killer Reputation TYRANT only. Before this general is set up for the first time, you can pick an additional big name for them. That big name cannot be the same as their first big name. Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Tyrant 6"884+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Beastskewer Glaive If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Beastskewer Glaive that targets a HERO or MONSTER is 6, the Beastskewer Glaive has a Damage characteristic of D6 instead of D3 for that attack.
        Big Name When you select this unit to be part of your army, you can pick one of the following big names to apply to this unit. Record this information on your army roster.
        Bully of the First Degree If a friendly OGOR MAWTRIBES unit fails a battleshock test within 3" of any friendly units with the ability, only 1 model in that unit will flee.
        Deathcheater This unit has a ward of 5+.
        Thundermace If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Thundermace is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage. If the target unit has more than 3 models, on an unmodified 6, that attack inflicts D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Beastskewer Glaive Melee2"23+3+-1D3
        Ogor Pistols Missile12"24+3+-1D3
        Thundermace Melee2"33+3+-23

    • Battleline [960pts]

      • Ironguts [240pts]

        Selections: 4 Ironguts [240pts], Mighty Bashing Weapon, Musician, Standard Bearer

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, OGOR MAWTRIBES, OGOR, GUTBUSTERS, IRONGUTS, Other, Battleline, Infantry

        Unit: Ironguts, Unit Abilities: Bellower, Champion, Down to the Ironguts, Gutguard, Rune Maw Bearer, Weapon: Mighty Bashing Weapon


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Ironguts 6"474+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bellower 1 in every 4 models in this unit can be a Bellower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Bellowers.
        Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Gutlord. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Mighty Bashing Weapon.
        Down to the Ironguts Once per battle, in the combat phase, after this unit has fought for the first time in that phase, you can say that they will unleash their ferocity. If you do so, this unit can fight for a second time in that phase. The strike-last effect applies to this unit when they fight for that second time.
        Gutguard Before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly TYRANT, or instead of making a ward roll for a wound or mortal wound that would be allocated to a friendly TYRANT, if that friendly TYRANT is within 3" of this unit, you can roll a dice. On a 1-2, that wound or mortal wound is allocated to that TYRANT as normal. On a 3+, that wound or mortal wound is allocated to this unit instead of that TYRANT.
        Rune Maw Bearer 1 in every 4 models in this unit can be a Rune Maw Bearer. If this unit includes any Rune Maw Bearers, each time this unit is affected by a spell or the abilities of an endless spell, you can roll a dice. On a 6, ignore the effect of that spell or the effects of that endless spell's abilities on this unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Mighty Bashing Weapon Melee2"33+3+-23

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Ogor Mawtribes

          Selections: Meatfist Mawtribe

          Battle Trait: Fleshy Stampede, Grasp of the Everwinter, Gulping Bites, Mawtribes, Might Makes Right, Ravenous Brutes, Trampling Charge, Monstrous Rampage: Chill of the Everwinter, Unstoppable Charge


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Fleshy Stampede Add 1 to each roll made for the Trampling Charge battle trait by friendly MEATFIST GUTBUSTERS units.
        Grasp of the Everwinter At the start of your hero phase, roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly BEASTCLAW RAIDERS units. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of the current battle round, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Gulping Bites At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly GUTBUSTERS OGOR units. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Mawtribes You can pick 1 one subfaction for your army (core rules, 27.2.1). All OGOR MAWTRIBES units in your army gain the keyword of the subfaction you picked, and you can use the allegiance abilities for that subfaction. If a unit already has a different subfaction keyword on its warscroll, it cannot gain another one. This does not preclude you from including the unit in your army, but you cannot use the allegiance abilities for its subfaction.
        Might Makes Right For the purposes of contesting objectives (core rules, 18.1.2), each friendly OGOR MAWTRIBES OGOR counts as 2 models, each friendly OGOR MAWTRIBES HERO that is not a MONSTER counts as 5 models, and each friendly OGOR MAWTRIBES MONSTER counts as 10 models.
        Ravenous Brutes If an OGOR MAWTRIBES OGOR unit is more than 3" from any enemy units, it is hungry. If an OGOR MAWTRIBES OGOR unit is within 3" of any enemy units, it is eating. Add 2" to the Move characteristic of a unit that is hungry. Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that is eating.
        Trampling Charge After a friendly OGOR or RHINOX unit makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that unit and roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll for that charge move. Add 1 to each roll if the charging unit is an OGOR unit that has 3 or more models. Add 2 to each roll if it is a MONSTER. For each 6+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Monstrous Rampage Description Ref
        Chill of the Everwinter Only a THUNDERTUSK unit that has made a charge move in the same phase can carry out this monstrous rampage. Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 3+, the strike-last effect applies to that unit until the end of the following combat phase.
        Unstoppable Charge Only a STONEHORN unit that has made a charge move in the same phase can carry out this monstrous rampage. This unit makes a 3D6" move and can pass across enemy units in the same manner as a unit that can fly. It must finish the move within 3" of any enemy units. At the end of the move, roll a dice for each unit it passed across. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Ready for Plunder

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Ready for Plunder


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Ready for Plunder When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are more friendly units wholly within enemy territory than enemy units.
